words."},{"lineNumber":149887,"originalJapaneseLine":"その日は更に358名が増えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"That day, 358 more people were forest,"},{"lineNumber":149890,"originalJapaneseLine":"しまいには直接お城に","translatedEnglishLine":"and eventually, they came directly to the castle"},{"lineNumber":149891,"originalJapaneseLine":"助けを求めにくる始末になっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"to ask for help."},{"lineNumber":149892,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクの城は","translatedEnglishLine":"Kesselink's castle"},{"lineNumber":149893,"originalJapaneseLine":"日に日に、メイドの数が増えていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"saw its number of maids increase day by day."},{"lineNumber":149894,"originalJapaneseLine":"数日後――","translatedEnglishLine":"A few days later—"},{"lineNumber":149895,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクの部屋――","translatedEnglishLine":"In Kesselink’s room—"},{"lineNumber":149896,"originalJapaneseLine":"「現在、この城には","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Currently, in this castle,"},{"lineNumber":149897,"originalJapaneseLine":"　2327名の人間が保護されています」","translatedEnglishLine":"2,327 humans are being protected.\""},{"lineNumber":149898,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":149899,"originalJapaneseLine":"エルシールの報告をケッセルリンクは","translatedEnglishLine":"Kesselink listened silently to Elcil’s report,"},{"lineNumber":149900,"originalJapaneseLine":"手元のワインを揺らしながら黙って聞いている。","translatedEnglishLine":"shaking the wine in his hand quietly."},{"lineNumber":149901,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その全てが不幸な身の上を持つ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"All of them are unfortunate girls,"},{"lineNumber":149902,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間界での居場所を失いここに逃げてきた娘」","translatedEnglishLine":"who have lost their place in the human world and fled here.\""},{"lineNumber":149903,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言うまでもないことですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Needless to say..."},{"lineNumber":149904,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これは人間側の罠です」","translatedEnglishLine":"this is a trap set by the humans.\""},{"lineNumber":149905,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":149906,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクは何も言わない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kesselink said nothing."},{"lineNumber":149907,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私達は現在、内部に多数の敵兵を抱えた状態」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We currently have numerous enemy soldiers inside."},{"lineNumber":149908,"originalJapaneseLine":"それだけでなく、彼女らの管理と保護の為に","translatedEnglishLine":"Not only that, but managing and protecting them"},{"lineNumber":149909,"originalJapaneseLine":"　多数の物資と手間が使われ、","translatedEnglishLine":"uses a great deal of resources and effort,"},{"lineNumber":149910,"originalJapaneseLine":"　軍事的な作戦行動は何も行えません」","translatedEnglishLine":"and we cannot conduct any military operations.\""},{"lineNumber":149911,"originalJapaneseLine":"「完全に身動きを封じられています」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We are completely immobilized.\""},{"lineNumber":149912,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それで」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...And so,"},{"lineNumber":149913,"originalJapaneseLine":"「エルシール、君はどうするべきと考える」","translatedEnglishLine":"Elcil, what do you think we should do?\""},{"lineNumber":149914,"originalJapaneseLine":"ようやく、ケッセルリンクはワインを置き、","translatedEnglishLine":"Finally, Kesselink put down his wine,"},{"lineNumber":149915,"originalJapaneseLine":"エルシールの顔を見た。","translatedEnglishLine":"and looked at Elcil's face."},{"lineNumber":149916,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I...\""},{"lineNumber":149917,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この城の放棄を提案します」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I suggest abandoning this castle.\""},{"lineNumber":149918,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なるほど、彼女達を見捨てるべき、と」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see. So you think we should abandon them.\""},{"lineNumber":149919,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その通りです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Exactly.\""},{"lineNumber":149920,"originalJapaneseLine":"「他の子達はどうしているかね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What about the other girls?\""},{"lineNumber":149921,"originalJapaneseLine":"「他の子……メイド達、ですか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The other girls... the maids?\""},{"lineNumber":149922,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そう、ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, well...\""},{"lineNumber":149923,"originalJapaneseLine":"「加奈代は食事作りに忙しそうです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kanayo seems busy with cooking meals."},{"lineNumber":149924,"originalJapaneseLine":"　休む暇もなく料理を作り続けてます」","translatedEnglishLine":"She keeps cooking without any rest.\""},{"lineNumber":149925,"originalJapaneseLine":"「バーバラは食材の調達として、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Barbara, for procuring ingredients,"},{"lineNumber":149926,"originalJapaneseLine":"　野生の動物を捕りに行ったり、","translatedEnglishLine":"goes hunting wild animals,"},{"lineNumber":149927,"originalJapaneseLine":"　捌いたりと毎日血まみれになってます」","translatedEnglishLine":"and butchering them — every day she's covered in blood.\""},{"lineNumber":149928,"originalJapaneseLine":"「パレロアさんは主に寝る場所などの確保を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Pareloa-san mainly secures places to sleep...\""},{"lineNumber":149929,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうかしたかね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is something the matter?\""},{"lineNumber":149930,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、中には","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, among them...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャロンはそっと、
自分の胸に手を置いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: placed her hand on her chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私達も……
そうしてここにいるのでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are here for the same reason, aren't we?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャロンの言葉に反論できるものはいなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No one could argue against Sharon's words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その日は更に358名が増えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That day, 358 more people were added.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次の日は500名が……
毎日のように森の中で不幸な娘が見つかり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Every day, unfortunate girls were found in the forest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しまいには直接お城に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and eventually, they came directly to the castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 助けを求めにくる始末になっていた。
ケッセルリンクの城は
日に日に、メイドの数が増えていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: saw its number of maids increase day by day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日後――
ケッセルリンクの部屋――
「現在、この城には
2327名の人間が保護されています」
エルシールの報告をケッセルリンクは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kesselink listened silently to Elcil’s report,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手元のワインを揺らしながら黙って聞いている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shaking the wine in his hand quietly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その全てが不幸な身の上を持つ、
人間界での居場所を失いここに逃げてきた娘」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: who have lost their place in the human world and fled here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言うまでもないことですが……
これは人間側の罠です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this is a trap set by the humans."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクは何も言わない。
「私達は現在、内部に多数の敵兵を抱えた状態」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We currently have numerous enemy soldiers inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけでなく、彼女らの管理と保護の為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not only that, but managing and protecting them

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多数の物資と手間が使われ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: uses a great deal of resources and effort,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍事的な作戦行動は何も行えません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we cannot conduct any military operations."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「完全に身動きを封じられています」
「……それで」
「エルシール、君はどうするべきと考える」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elcil, what do you think we should do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく、ケッセルリンクはワインを置き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, Kesselink put down his wine,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エルシールの顔を見た。
「この城の放棄を提案します」
「なるほど、彼女達を見捨てるべき、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see. So you think we should abandon them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その通りです」
「他の子達はどうしているかね？」
「他の子……メイド達、ですか？
そう、ですね……」
「加奈代は食事作りに忙しそうです。
休む暇もなく料理を作り続けてます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She keeps cooking without any rest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バーバラは食材の調達として、
野生の動物を捕りに行ったり、
捌いたりと毎日血まみれになってます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and butchering them — every day she's covered in blood."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パレロアさんは主に寝る場所などの確保を……」
「どうかしたかね？」
「いえ、中には

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
